title: Light Mummy
summaries: Mummies are Hardmode Desert enemies. They spawn in areas where Sand Blocks are present, and follow the Fighter AI (behaving similar to Zombies).
There are several different types of Mummies: Dark Mummies, Light Mummies, and Blood Mummies.
On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop, [img:Console version] Console, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile versions, they spawn in Corrupted Deserts, Crimson Deserts and Hallowed Deserts, respectively.

On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console, 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version], and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader versions, the Dark Mummies can spawn in both Corrupted/Crimson Deserts.

On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console and 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] versions, there are other two exclusive types of Mummies: Shadow Mummies and Spectral Mummies, which spawn in Corrupted Deserts and Hallowed Deserts respectively.

Dark Mummies and Blood Mummies are 150% faster than other Mummies. All mummies receive a 200% speed increase when they are reduced to 50% health or lower. In addition, mummies inflict the following debuffs:

• Regular Mummies: Slow
  • Dark Mummies/Blood Mummies/Shadow Mummies: Silenced, Darkness
  • Light Mummies/Spectral Mummies: Confused
